title: TradingView Desktop Electron Uncontrolled Search Path Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of TradingView Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the configuration of the Electron framework. The product loads a script file from an unsecured location. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of a target user.
timeline:
2025-07-18 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-12-10 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-12-10 - Advisory Updated
